mapper.select: select distinct tr.uri from t_admin_resource tar join t_resource tr on tar.resource_id = tr.id where tar.admin_id = #{adminId} and tr.status = 1 union select distinct tre.uri from t_admin_role tar join t_role tr on tar.role_id = tr.id and tr.status = 1 join t_role_resource trr on tr.id = trr.role_id join t_resource tre on trr.resource_id = tre.id where tar.admin_id = #{adminId} and tre.status = 1
